description:
Is it a gift from Buddha or is it stealing? The answers you sneak can come in many forms and give your friend the benefit of the doubt.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ato Kakushi no Yuki / Mittsu no Nazokake / Kootta Koe
The Hiding Snow / The Three Riddles / The Deep Voice
あとかくしの雪 / 三つの謎かけ / こおった声
